data: For years and years I’ve been deeply wounded in my most sacred feelings and my reason has been outraged by my partner, Samantha’s, writing against the righteous cause of man’s superiority to women.
For years and years I've been deeply wownded in my most sacred feelin's and my reason has been outraged by my pardner, Samantha's, writin' agin the righteous cause of man's superiority to wimmen.

Josiah Allen on the Woman Question
